resources.string: <font color="#777777">On the official method of WHO BMI, Your average weight with using a profile of you height is</font> <font color="#45c383">%1$d ~ %2$d kg</font> <font color="#777777"></font>
Good morning, we can do a 10,000 steps right?
Starting a fresh day by walking!
Did you know walking can prevent from the adult disease, depression, Stress? It\'s fantastic day let us do a walking!
If you walk 10,000 steps a day, you will get healthier body.
You can able to fulfill the minimum of 2000~3000 steps by walking in daily time. Our plan for today is 10,000 steps. Why don’t you walk about 30mins today’s night time?
Starting is really important. You’ve walked a few. Let’s focus to fulfill 10,000 steps.
If this message has appeared at night time, you should do the exercise right now. But if not, you’ve done it well today!
Half way to go, why don’t you do a walking exercise? You can fulfill the 5000 steps only by 30mins in minimum.
3000 steps left to go. Why don’t you walk from the bus station or subway station to your house? Tomorrow’s morning will be more fresh than today.
Why don’t you finish your day by doing walking exercise? You can fulfill the 2000 steps only by 10mins in minimum.
ou can fulfill the 1000 steps only by 5mins in minimum.
You’ve almost finish your daily aiming point.
Will you start on speed walking? Speed walking can consume 3.5 kcal per mins and will make your lung’s function healthy and muscle to be stronger.
Ever heard of rash waling? It’s literally rash walking can consume your energy in 4.5 kcal per mins. Also helps your aerobic exercise ability prevent from the adult disease and cure your body.
Let us do the power walking. This walking can help to consume energy in 7.5 kcal per mins and also very effective to reduce the weight.
Walking exercise can reduce your inner-fat to help to refine diabetes with preventing from the adult disease and cure try to fulfill your left over walking to get healthy body.

This exercise is the best workout to do energetic movement to raise the heartbeats and also the endurance and muscular strength.
It is best for the reducing fat as soon as possible.
The period of the workout time has to be bigger than "0"
Put your target weight ,lower than your weight
This is the Accuracy of the posture movement. If you do the exercise correctly , it will show you that you are doing right posture and had burn more calorie.
It shows the comparison between today\'s calories and target calories. If you go over the target calories , It will consider that you have done perfectly and correctly.
It shows how many time you have done it perfectly with using percentages. Increase the number of exercise will power up the exercise accuracy and strength.

It shows on doing exercise maximal heart rate with comparison of the users currently heart rate. If this value is low quality, the better the cardiopulmonary function improves, reducing the consumption of calories. Also if the value 80 % and more it would appear physical excess.
The numberical value of averages will shows the points on the graph chart. High point would concluded the users to be high physical movement and healthy.

It is the recommendation pre-exercise of iBODY24. Pre- exercise is really important, must do more than 5 mins before the proper exercise.\nAlso it pre vent from injury.\nClick the video clip, it will start pre- exercise.

The program of Making abdominal muscles from LEE.J.Y trainer is PRO- level exercise that not only the abdominal muscles but also all of the body of core can be develop at the same time. All of people can follow the this program , the male can get six-pack , and the female can get perfectly shape abdominal muscles. the most important part of this exercise is posture so keep the eye on the trainer.

The program of Hip-up workout from LEE.J.Y trainer is PRO-Level exercise, which are very beneficial for the development of Gluteus and Backbone erector. Hip-up workout is not only good for the visual part but also helps to balance whole body structure. Please keep try to follow the coach to make sure not to break the body-balance.
The Total Body Training 1 is basic exercise to use whole body for amateur, all of people can make muscle or reduce the weight. Please follow the trainer.
The Total Body Training 2 is PRO- level exercise and its much harder than TBT1. TBT2 helps to reduce the fat of Thigh, Abdomen and can also increase the muscle. Please follow the trainer.

This exercise is for the women who has gave a afterbirth 1~4 weeks. The most important part of this exercise is to start at the slow time. Step.1 Yoga and weight training (it is exercise that balances the whole body structure) it helps to make a corrective pelvic osteotomy and strength the abdominal. Before starting the exercise, needs to give enough stretching, without doing too much exercise. Also needs to think to learn step by step. Mother who has done cesarean recommended to start exercise after the 2 months. Also with the mother who has give a normal birth need to take a enough resting before starting this exercise. iBODY24 is the exercise which has been certificated from the obstetrics gynecology.

This exercise is for the mother who has gave an afterbirth 5~8 weeks. It is ungraded version of Step.1; this exercise is more focus on the making whole body muscle with also focusing on the balance. Especially, its very good for the backbone erector. Before starting the exercise, please do enough stretching to get beautiful body other who has done cesarean recommended to start exercise after the 3~4 months. Also with the mother who has give a normal birth need to take a enough resting before starting this exercise. iBODY24 is the exercise which has been certificated from the obstetrics gynecology.

Pilates is not only give stretching and muscle making but also gives a perfect body with having non-use muscle to power up, so this can help all of people to fix the right posture and straighten the back-bone and pelvis. Let us make perfect body shape with me doing fun pilates and become beautiful body.

Hello, this is KOREHONG, HONG.DO HAN trainer. The most important part of exercise is the right posture, if you do not follow the rule of posture you may get injury. TBT program is for all of people even who are aged 100 to get healthy.Also this program can improve the function, strength the duration, and focused on the diet. why don\'t we throw all of the exercise you\'ve known, just follow me with using scientific method of basic exercise.

Hi, this is perfect body shape! Trainer KWON DO YEA. Most of the women has worries of how to do the exercise after giving a birth. What you have to do is try to have enough resting, and balanced eating habit!! Also if you add the after birth exercise you will able to double up those. With after birth exercise, you will going to take out the postpartum depression, bodily waste also can have perfect and nice body shape for the mothers. Then let us do the after birth exercise with me with using iBODY24.
